settings.content: Product Reviews: Go to Advanced Settings â€º Comments. Click the Built-in tab at the top of the page. Check the box next to Product Reviews to enable the built-in system. To disable it, uncheck the box.
Tip: Try to keep this under 40  - the higher the number, the more products that have to load = longer category page load times.
